meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>trash</radical> is a weird looking <radical>fruit</radical>. Someone decided to <kanji>abandon</kanji> it here.
readingMnemonic: You reach into the trash, take out the <kanji>abandon</kanji>ed fruit, and bite into it. OUCH! There's a <reading>key</reading> (き) inside, and you just bit into it.
